html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-06032021-06-17,  ,  GAC,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectThe Acts of the 27th Congress of the Universal Postal Union
PrecisOrder authorizing (1) the Prime Minister or the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take part in deliberations, and to vote and to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the ACTS OF THE 27TH CONGRESS OF THE UNIVERSAL POSTAL UNION; or (2) the Minister of Foreign Affairs to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers, authorizing the individuals mentioned in the order, to take part in deliberations, and to vote and to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the Acts.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: The Acts of the 27th Congress of the Universal Postal Union
precis: Order authorizing (1) the Prime Minister or the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take part in deliberations, and to vote and to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the ACTS OF THE 27TH CONGRESS OF THE UNIVERSAL POSTAL UNION; or (2) the Minister of Foreign Affairs to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers, authorizing the individuals mentioned in the order, to take part in deliberations, and to vote and to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the Acts.
